AD_ShadowlandsComment.synopsis: The spirit of the amulet comments on the state of the Shadowcurse and how it's effecting the land
AD_ShadowlandsComment.how_to_trigger: Enter SCL via any of the entrances from Act1 while wearing the amulet. Continue to follow the paths until the dialog starts.
